channel.title: Blogs on Rohit Mishra

item.title: 1. My thoughts on AI and the future!
item.description:
AI: Allen Iverson

Yes, we’re talking about Allen Iverson, not your fancy chatbots or “machine learning” fluff. Let’s be real: this AI practically changed basketball (and culture) forever. And guess what? He’s only getting started.

  1. Iverson’s Prime? It’s Now Forget the retirement talk—time off just means he’s coming back with bionic knees (figuratively, at least). While others “manage loads” and skip games left and right, Iverson’s been quietly perfecting the art of the crossover. If mid-40s comebacks were easy, everyone would do it. But that’s exactly why AI will.
